sentences.en: A much lower dose of the painkiller can still produce the desired effect.
sentences.cn: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

sentences.en: A system failure has a knock-on effect throughout the whole hotel.
sentences.cn: 系统故障会给整个酒店带来连锁反应。

sentences.en: Aloe may have an analgesic effect on inflammation and minor skin irritations.
sentences.cn: 芦荟可能对发炎以及轻微的皮肤炎症具有镇痛作用。

sentences.en: Even from a distance the effect of his fox costume was stunning.
sentences.cn: 即使从远处看，他的狐狸戏服也很抢眼。

sentences.en: I could feel the effects of the thin mountain air.
sentences.cn: 我能感觉到山上稀薄空气产生的影响。

sentences.en: I suspect he's controversial for effect.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑他喜欢争论是为给人留下深刻印象。

sentences.en: In his mind's eye, he can imagine the effect he's having.
sentences.cn: 他能在脑海里想象出将会达到的效果。

sentences.en: In mental illness, there is a complex relationship between cause and effect.
sentences.cn: 精神疾病有复杂的因果关系。

sentences.en: It is possible that a tax cut might have some stimulative effect.
sentences.cn: 减税或许会产生某种刺激作用——这是可能的。

sentences.en: It makes you wonder about the effect on men's behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这让人怀疑其对男性行为的影响。

sentences.en: Legislation to that effect created fierce controversy both in Parliament and outside.
sentences.cn: 那类立法在议会内外都引起了激烈的争论。

sentences.en: Many parents lack confidence in their ability to effect change in their children’s behaviour.
sentences.cn: 许多父母对自己是否有能力改变子女的行为缺乏信心。

sentences.en: Mr Morris feels the museum is using advertising to good effect.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯先生认为博物馆作的广告卓有成效。

sentences.en: Prospects for effecting real political change seemed to have taken a major step backwards.
sentences.cn: 实现真正政治变革的前景似乎暗淡了许多。

sentences.en: she thought it a foolish rule and put a notice to that effect in a newspaper.
sentences.cn: 她认为这是条愚蠢的规定，并在报纸上发表短评表达了这一观点。

sentences.en: some comments to the effect that my essay was a little light on analysis.
sentences.cn: 一些大意为我的文章分析不够的评论。

sentences.en: Some sedatives produce the para-doxical effect of making the person more anxious.
sentences.cn: 一些镇静剂适得其反，加重了患者的焦虑。

sentences.en: testimony that in effect contradicted her earlier statement.
sentences.cn: 证词实际上与她以前的话相反

sentences.en: the cumulative effect of human activities on the global environment
sentences.cn: 人类活动对全球环境日积月累的影响

sentences.en: The domino effect if one train is cancelled is enormous.
sentences.cn: 如果一班火车被取消，其连锁反应将是巨大的。

sentences.en: The effect is soft and pretty rather than drop-dead sexy.
sentences.cn: 给人的印象是柔和俏丽而不是吸人眼球的性感。

sentences.en: The effect on coffee prices has been disastrous for the producers.
sentences.cn: 对咖啡价格的影响对生产商而言是灾难性的。

sentences.en: The greenhouse effect is well and truly with us.
sentences.cn: 我们完全处于温室效应中。

sentences.en: The illness had a profound effect on his outlook.
sentences.cn: 这场病对他的人生观产生了深刻的影响。

sentences.en: the long-term effects of the drug
sentences.cn: 这种毒品的长期影响

sentences.en: The specific impact of the greenhouse effect is unknowable.
sentences.cn: 温室效应的具体影响无法知道。

sentences.en: This ingredient also has the effect of making your skin look younger.
sentences.cn: 这种成分还有使皮肤看上去更年轻的效果。

sentences.en: What will be the effect of the alliance between IBM and Apple?
sentences.cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联手将会有什么效果呢？

words.tran_cn: 有效的，起作用的；实际的，实在的；给人深刻印象
有效地，生效地；有力地；实际上
[生理] 效应器；[遗] 效应物；操纵装置

phrases.tran_cn: 经济效益，利用效果；经济效应
生效；对…有作用；对…有效果；见效
负面影响；负效应；负磁力效应
以此为目的的，那样意思的

trans.tran_en: a change that is caused by an event, action etc

trans.tran_cn: 使产生， 招致； 实现
trans.tran_en: If you effect something that you are trying to achieve, you succeed in causing it to happen
